mapper.insert: insert into operation_log(operator_id, operator_name, operation_module, operation_type, operation_desc, request_uri, request_method, request_params, ip_address, execution_time, status, error_msg) values (#{operatorId}, #{operatorName}, #{operationModule}, #{operationType}, #{operationDesc}, #{requestUri}, #{requestMethod}, #{requestParams}, #{ipAddress}, #{executionTime}, #{status}, #{errorMsg})
